Contradict fact: The claim that the video shows a US drone strike killing General Qassem Soleimani is contradicted by the fact that the video is actually from a military simulation video game.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the content of the video by presenting it as real footage of the drone strike, when in fact it is a simulation.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a misleading Facebook post and does not provide any credible evidence to support the assertion that the video shows the drone strike.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the video is authentic and portrays the actual event, which is a problematic assumption given that it is from a video game.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation exists for the video, which is that it is a clip from a military simulation video game called AC-130 Gunship Simulator: Special Ops Squadron.
